Reactjs_Curriculum_key64: -------i) Users should be able to create their accounts.
Reactjs_Curriculum_key66: -------iii) Users can make posts with text, `files`, photos.

Reactjs_Curriculum_key68: -------v) Other users should be able to like, comment on the post.
Reactjs_Curriculum_key69: -------vi) User authentication means other users should not be able to edit anyone’s post. Only they should have comments, like and access.
